text: —Sauna. It's a world where you enjoy endurance and liberation.

The sensation of being exposed to steam and heat, rising to a peak.
The refreshing coolness that fills your body when you step outside.
And the relaxing effect of exposure to the open air...

However, the depth of sauna goes beyond that.
The time spent enduring the heat is also a time to face yourself—

name: Ganran
text: ...[Player], what are you mumbling about?

In the natural sauna, where [Player] was brought by Ganran,
along with Ryusei and reXer, [Player] looked up.

There, the three heroes were
enjoying the sauna's heat, dripping with sweat.

name: Ganran
text:
Filming or not filming...
Are you alright...?
Did the heat get to you?

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, perhaps it's about whether
to film this scene for ChocoFull?

name: reXer
text:
Oh, I see.
That drone would probably
withstand high temperatures, but...

name: reXer
text:
Today's filming is over,
so why don't we consider this off-duty?
You need to relax too, right?

name: Ryusei
text:
That's right. If we're going to film,
it'd be better if Hitomi-chan was with us too!
Besides, it feels so good—!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
How is it, isn't it a good heat?
It really clears your head!

Dripping with sweat,
Ganran grinned broadly.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, my muscles are relaxing themselves,
and my whole body is warming up!
We exercised a lot today—!

name: reXer
text:
Even so, this sauna...
I'm surprised it's similar in style to Earth's.

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, I thought so too.
I heard that Garunderra has many
cultures and customs different from Earth.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
The interior changed a while ago!
It's probably the owner's hobby!

name: Ganran
text:
Since you all were coming,
they probably adjusted the room temperature
to be comfortable for Earthlings!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, really!
I'm happy that they incorporated
Earth's style and that we can enjoy it—!

options.text: It's a comfortable heat even for us to enjoy.

name: Ganran
text:
There's a Garunderra style too,
of course? Want to try it?
It's even hotter than this, though!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, that sounds good—!
I feel like I'd sweat a lot,
and I'm a little interested—!

name: Ganran
text:
You'll feel the power of the volcano!
How about it, let's have an endurance contest!
Of course, only to the extent you can handle!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, alright—!
reXer-kun, [Player]-san,
how about you two, want to give it a try?

Ryusei, wiping away sweat,
called out to reXer and [Player].

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, no, this heat is just right for me, so I'll pass.
Thank you, Ryusei, Ganran.

name: reXer
text:
Since we're here, you two go ahead.
What about you, [Player]?

options.text: I think I'll stay here too.
I'm curious, but I can't stand it if it's too hot...

name: Ryusei
text:
Okay, got it. Don't overdo it.
You should drink a lot of water!

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, everyone enjoys saunas differently!
Take your time and relax!

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, let's go, Ryusei!
You'll compete in endurance, right!?
I can't wait!

name: Ganran
text:
Before entering the Garunderra style,
let us go into the cold bath too!
We can have an endurance contest here too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, Ganran-san really loves enduring things—!
Okay, I won't lose—!
The two stood up and exited the sauna.

name: reXer
text:
Hahah, those two are having fun.
Was it okay for you, [Player]?
Not going with Ryusei and Ganran, I mean.
[Player] shook their head in response to reXer's question.

options.text: I won't ask if it's hard to talk about...

text:
reXer's hand, which was wiping away
sweat with a towel, stopped abruptly.

name: reXer
text: ...Amazing. I was trying to hide it.

name: reXer
text:
It's nothing big.
...Just, there's something I've been thinking about lately.

reXer looked up at the ceiling
and sighed as he spoke.

name: reXer
text:
...Hey, [Player].
What do you think it means to become an adult?

name: reXer
text:
...It's a bit pathetic, but even working like this,
I still feel like I haven't become a full-fledged adult.

name: reXer
text:
I want to become a respectable adult like my father.
I've always thought that since I was little.
reXer continued, gazing at his palms.

name: reXer
text:
Fighting monsters and villains in the cyber world with [Player],
made me feel like I was able to become a true hero.

name: reXer
text:
Since then, I officially acquired my license,
and I thought I had finally taken a step towards standing alongside my father.

name: reXer
text: ...I don't want people to forget my father, "reXer".

name: reXer
text:
So, while spreading the name "reXer"
that my father built up to the world again...

name: reXer
text:
I was able to have the dream of someday becoming a hero who can surpass my father.
That hasn't changed, of course, even now.

Having said that much, reXer looked up and gazed into the distance.
The tip of his tail lightly tapped the floor.

name: reXer
text:
...But the main work of the agency is entertainment activities.
Recently, the number of real-life engagements has increased.

name: reXer
text:
Until now, I had them suspend activities,
but now that I've inherited "reXer,"
I have to handle them well.

Clasping his hands tightly,
reXer faced [Player] with a serious gaze.

name: reXer
text:
This ChocoFull is also like that.
I think I've been able to handle it little by little...

name: reXer
text:
...But being a talent is difficult.
I keep making mistakes, and I feel like I have to do better.

name: reXer
text:
Alright, then, to make the phantom chocolate by hand,
first, we need to find the ingredients...
Is that right?

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's right.
But first, let's show the viewers the scenery of this planet!

name: reXer
text:
Eh, ah, yeah, that's right!
...Surprisingly, there are plants growing too!

name: reXer
text: ...No, then I have to complete this mission quickly, right?

name: reXer
text: If necessary, I'll go scout the village first—

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, it's alright, reXer-san!
The show's directors haven't really abandoned us, you know.

name: Ryusei
text:
I think they want to trouble us a little and get some interesting shots.
It's unique to NeoTalents' planning.

name: reXer
text:
I-Is that how it works...?
.........

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, I finally found it!
Now, let's immediately go meet the village's best blacksmith!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, reXer-kun.
The camera's over here.

name: reXer
text:
Eh, ah...!
Th-this drone!?

name: reXer
text:
Heheh, it's about making progress
towards becoming an adult, I guess.

options.text: ...So that's what you were worried about.
I think that's a good quality of reXer too.

text:
Closing his eyes at [Player]'s words,
he slowly shook his head.

name: reXer
text:
...Hitomi is younger than me,
but she's doing a great job as an idol,
and Ryusei is also active as a model.

name: reXer
text:
Maybe it's not something to compare with others,
but I think that's how it is for "visible jobs" in both
the entertainment world and the gaming world.

name: reXer
text:
...I tried to be like my father,
to imitate what he did—

reXer's sweat dripped from the ends of his matted hair.
His serious voice echoed through the quiet sauna.

name: reXer
text:
Showmanship, talking skills, navigating as a celebrity...
I'm still lacking in all of them.

name: reXer
text:
At this rate, I won't be able to catch up.
And even if I do, I won't be able to surpass "reXer".

name: reXer
text:
...I know there's no point in rushing.
So, I'm trying to take it one step at a time, but still.
Gazing directly at the powerless reXer, [Player] smiled.

options.text: It wasn't just failures, was it?
You noticed the blacksmith's hint, didn't you?
You were entrusted with the job because you were the right person!

name: reXer
text: ...[Player]. Ah, thank you.

name: reXer
text:
But... my father would have surely done better.
I have to surpass my father.

name: reXer
text:
...I'm cunning, aren't I?
If I say it like this, [Player] will say—
Shaking their head to interrupt reXer, [Player] continued.

options.text: Why don't you relax a little?
It's okay to be natural, I'm sure!

name: reXer
text:
...Me, as myself, huh.
.........

name: reXer
text:
...That's right.
Even in games, I make mistakes.
But there was no stage I couldn't clear.

name: reXer
text:
Thank you, [Player].
I'll think about it a little.
I don't have an answer yet, but—

name: reXer
text:
I was vaguely frustrated.
Wondering what I should do when
I couldn't stay like this...

name: reXer
text:
My father—
what would "I" do if I were "him"...
There might not be a right answer, though.

name: reXer
text:
Even so, I'll try a little harder to become an adult in my own way.
Of course, one that my father can be proud of!

reXer stood up vigorously,
clenching his fist as if to pump himself up.

options.text: You really love your father, don't you?
I'm sure reXer can do it!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, my head feels refreshed.
Maybe it's thanks to [Player]'s words and the sauna!

As if sparkling sweat was bursting,
reXer showed a brighter smile than before.

At that moment,
a faint light overflowed from the device.

name: reXer
text:
—Hm?
What's wrong, [Player]?

[Player] smiled back at reXer,
who was peering in.

options.text: That was a good expression just now!
I wondered if I should have filmed it!

name: reXer
text:
—Hahaha, what's that about!
You're a proper cameraman,
that's just so like you, [Player].

name: reXer
text:
Alright, let's head outside for a bit.
Ryusei and the others should be back soon...
Huh? An earthquake... Whoa!?

At that moment, a sudden,
large tremor struck the two.

Continuing, a strange chill ran down their spine,
accompanied by a sense of unease.
[Player] shivered slightly.

name: reXer
text:
...That was quite a shake.
Are you alright, [Player]?

reXer offered a hand to [Player], who was hunched over.
At the same time, the sauna door opened.

name: Ganran
text: —Hey, are you two alright!?

name: Ryusei
text:
That was quite a big shake.
I was surprised...
Are you two unharmed?

name: reXer
text:
Ah, yeah... We're fine.
You two seem alright too.

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, an earthquake happened again.
It's shaking a lot today.
Well, as long as nothing happened, that's what matters!

name: Ryusei
text:
We just finished refreshing ourselves,
so shall we head back to the hotel soon?

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right.
It was a good match, too...
A bit disappointing.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, let's do it again, Ganran-san!
It'd be great if reXer-kun and Hitomi-chan could join us next time!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that's right.
...What's wrong, [Player]?
reXer asked [Player], looking concerned.

options.text: I've felt that unpleasant tremor before...

name: Ganran
text:
Are you alright, [Player]?
Maybe you stayed in the sauna too long.
Here, rest over here.

name: Ryusei
text:
Right, I'll go get some water!
[Player]-san, wait here for a moment!

[Player] returned words of thanks.
But a strange sense of unease still lingered deep in their chest.

Chapter 4:
Many Things to Worry About, But...

—The next day.
The group gathered in front of Ganran's workshop.

name: Ryusei
text:
Good morning, everyone!
It's another beautiful day!
I feel refreshed thanks to yesterday's sauna—!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, I feel like my fatigue has flown away!
Let's do our best searching for rock cacao today too!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, that's right!
Please tell me about the sauna too!
But before that...
Hitomi bowed her head towards Ganran.

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san, I'm sorry for breaking
the pickaxe you lent me yesterday!

name: Ganran
text:
Nah, don't worry about it! I have other spares, but...
Since you're here, I'll customize one just for you, Hito-chan!

name: Ganran
text:
I'll reforge it to be stronger than the previous one,
and harder to break, so could you wait a bit?

name: Hitomi
text:
Thank you so much...!
I'll help you!

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, that helps!
Then, could you bring those tools over there?
Please come inside the workshop!
Ganran beckoned, and the group stepped inside the workshop.

Inside, various tools and equipment for blacksmithing were lined up,
and many finished products were displayed on a shelf near the entrance.

options.text: There are so many different tools!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, amazing!
You make a lot of farming tools and household items too!

name: reXer
text:
Did Ganran forge all
these swords and axes too?

name: Ganran
text: Gahahaha! Yeah, that's right! Not bad, right?

name: Ganran
text:
Oh yeah, your Parallel Weapon was also a sword and an axe, wasn't it!
It had a mechanism to switch forms.

name: reXer
text: Ah, that's something I inherited from my father.

name: reXer
text:
The weapons here are amazing too.
Can I see some others?

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, of course!
It'll take a bit of time,
so feel free to look around!

name: Hitomi
text: Ganran-san, I'll put the tools here.

name: Hitomi
text:
Oh. This axe is different from the others;
it's still unfinished.

Hitomi pointed to several unfinished axes,
likely prototypes, covered in dust.

name: Ganran
text:
...Ah, those are my apprentice's creations.
As you can see, they're incomplete.

name: Ganran
text:
Her skill is still developing, but...
well, it's not bad.
There's quite a bit of potential, don't you think?

name: Ryusei
text:
You have an apprentice!?
Ganran-san really feels like a master, doesn't he—!

options.text: I'm curious about your apprentice's story!
What kind of person are they?

name: Hitomi
text:
I'm curious too!
How does one become an apprentice blacksmith?

name: reXer
text:
Indeed, I'm curious too.
She doesn't seem to be here right now, so where is she?

At the four's words,
Ganran stopped what he was preparing.

name: Ganran
text:
My apprentice is a bit special, you could say...
I don't think it'll be much reference for you.

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, she's gone to a somewhat distant place right now.
She's not here.

name: Ganran
text:
It's not a particularly interesting story...
But it's not something to hide either.
Want to listen to it to pass the time?

As Ganran spoke, he skillfully prepared for the
pickaxe's modification and activated the forge.

Ganran's face was lit red.
Gazing at the fire, Ganran quietly began to speak.

name: Ganran
text:
—On a certain planet,
I received a request to forge a "treasured axe that brings peace"
that was in the country's legends.

name: Ganran
text:
They wanted it to be a symbol of a country where everyone could live in peace.
It wasn't an easy job, but—

name: Ganran
text:
...In the middle of that job, a giant monster appeared.
The country collapsed, and it was a terrible sight.

name: Ganran
text:
That's where I met my apprentice, Barte.
She was entrusted to me by her parents.
We returned to Garunderra together.

name: Ganran
text:
Since then, I've been raising Barte like her parent figure...
But, I don't know who she takes after, she's mischievous.

name: Ganran
text:
It's a good thing she grew up energetic, but...
She used to sneak into the workshop all the time.

name: Ganran
text:
She's a full-grown adult now, but...
She's always said she wanted to "try forging too".

name: Ganran
text:
—Phew, that's enough for today.
Barte, what are you doing in the workshop again?

Barte exhaled as she looked at the
polished blade of the axe Ganran had forged.

name: Barte
text:
...It's beautiful. Hey, Ganran.
How do you forge iron like this?

name: Ganran
text:
What, are you interested in my technique?
You only like the tip of the blade, don't you?

name: Ganran
text:
Don't carelessly touch things in the workshop.
One wrong move, and blades can cause irreversible injuries.

name: Barte
text:
I know!
...But it's so beautiful.
I'll be careful not to get hurt!

name: Ganran
text: ...Hah. Listen, don't touch the blade.

Barte carefully held the axe handed to him by Ganran,
narrowing her eyes at its tip.

name: Barte
text:
..."Beautiful" is the word for
things like this, huh.

name: Barte
text:
Hey, Ganran!
Let me forge an axe!
Be my master!

name: Barte
text:
I want to forge one too!
A beautiful blade with my own hands!
Please, can I?

name: Ganran
text:
—No matter how many times you ask, the answer is no.
I told you it's dangerous.
Geez, you get carried away so easily.

name: Ganran
text:
If I were to let you get hurt,
I wouldn't be able to face your parents.

name: Ganran
text:
...Besides, I don't take apprentices.
I still haven't forged what I want to create.

name: Barte
text:
What, you stingy old man!
Come on, your skill is amazing,
and I'll definitely be careful not to get hurt!

name: Ganran
text:
No means no.
...Even so, why do you want to forge an axe?

name: Ganran
text:
If you need something, I'll forge it for you.
You don't need to do blacksmithing work yourself.

Barte, who was questioned by Ganran,
looked straight back at him and answered immediately with a full smile.

name: Barte
text:
—Because the axe Ganran forges is so shiny and
beautiful that I want to forge it myself!

name: Barte
text:
It must be because
Ganran's heart is beautiful—!
It's amazing, right—!

"—Because I thought the axe you forged was very beautiful.
No one else could forge that axe."

"Moreover, I realized it after coming here many times.
It's because your heart is beautiful that you can forge that axe—"

name: Barte
text:
Hey, Ganran!
...No, "Master"!
Please, teach me!

name: Barte
text:
I won't move from here until you become my master!
I won't even eat dinner!!

name: Ganran
text:
...Hah. That stubbornness,
I wonder who you take after...

name: Ganran
text:
...Come a little early tomorrow.
We'll go buy the necessary tools.

name: Barte
text:
Ganran—no, Master!!
Alright—!!
I can forge, right!!

name: Ganran
text:
Don't get too carried away.
Iron Rule, number one!
'Always prioritize safety'!

name: Ganran
text:
Listen, if you do anything dangerous that could cause injury,
I'll disown you without question!

name: Barte
text:
Yeah, I know!
But what I've always wanted is finally coming true,
so it's okay to be happy, right?

name: Barte
text:
Alright, it starts tomorrow!
I'll do my best!

name: Ganran
text:
—Well, that's how I took Barte as my apprentice,
but after a while, there was a monster incident on this planet too.

name: Ganran
text:
At that time, she went missing.
...He was swallowed by a giant path where the monster appeared.

The rest of [Player]'s words were drowned out
by the sound of Ganran striking his hammer.

name: Ganran
text:
...Iron Rule, number one!
'Always live with hope'!
I'm sure she's still alive.

name: Ganran
text:
That blade-obsessed idiot is quite thick-skinned.
She'll just pop back up eventually.

name: Ganran
text:
She's kept me waiting for a long time, but...
well, for my race, it's still a short time!

Ganran picked up the pickaxe he had
been forging and meticulously inspected it.
He had the eyes of a craftsman.

name: Ganran
text:
When Barte returns, I'll have to welcome her back as his master again.
I can't neglect my training as a blacksmith either.

name: Ganran
text:
She's far away now, but she must be living well somewhere.
When she eventually comes back, please treat her well too.

name: Ganran
text:
...Alright, that's enough of my old stories.
Now, if I put it in the cooling machine,
it'll be finished by the time we climb the mountain!

Ganran performed a final check on the reforged pickaxe,
then set it into a portable-sized machine.

name: Ganran
text:
...You don't have to make that face, I'm fine!
Maybe I talked a bit too long.

name: Hitomi
text:
No, even though it was difficult to talk about,
thank you for telling us about your apprentice.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, at least I understand well
that Ganran is a respectable master.

name: reXer
text:
...I also had someone like a game master.
So, I understand how it feels a little.
It reminded me of when I was training.

Ganran nodded in response to reXer's quiet reply.
Then, without further words, he opened the workshop door.

name: Ganran
text:
...When we're heroes,
these kinds of stories tend to pile up,
I suppose.

name: Ganran
text: Alright, enough with the gloomy talk.

name: Ganran
text:
If we don't go further than yesterday,
we won't find the rock cacao!
Let's climb the Choco Volcano!

name: Ryusei
text:
That's right, let's depart right away.
We have to get our share of rock cacao today, don't we!

name: reXer
text: Yeah, let's go with enthusiasm for ChocoFull too!

name: reXer
text:
...On the second day,
I've gotten a little used to this heat.

The Choco Hunters, having left the workshop,
were once again proceeding along the mountain path of Choco Volcano.

name: Ryusei
text:
It's a different path from yesterday!
I hope we find some today too—!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that's right.
Walking on a volcanic path like this
reminds me of the game world.

name: Ryusei
text:
Volcano stages are often difficult, aren't they?
I play games sometimes, but I can never clear them.

name: Hitomi
text:
Usually, if you fall into magma,
it's game over, right?

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that's probably why they're common in the later stages
with higher difficulty, but good items often drop there too!

name: reXer
text:
The game I used to play often was like that too.
My father was the developer—

name: reXer
text:
I was excited watching him create the highest difficulty volcano stages.
I always thought I'd clear it someday.

options.text: What's the name of the game?

text:
[Player] and the others continued the recording amicably
as they proceeded along the mountain path.
And the topic shifted from games to chocolate.

name: Ganran
text:
—This time, the staff brought various Earth chocolates,
and they were delicious!

name: Ganran
text:
Speaking of which,
do you all eat a lot of chocolate?

name: Ganran
text:
I thought talents had dietary
restrictions or something like that.

name: Ryusei
text:
I sometimes eat chocolate with a high cacao content.
It helps muscle growth and provides carbohydrates!

name: Ryusei
text:
Also, a lot of the protein powder
I drink every day is chocolate-flavored!
How about you, Hitomi-chan?

name: Hitomi
text:
I love chocolate too!
Recently, it's become so easy to eat
chocolates from various planets!

name: Hitomi
text:
...But, I'm afraid of eating too much,
so I try to only have it when I want to give myself a reward!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
That's good, a reward after enduring!
It tastes even better that way!

name: reXer
text:
I also often eat it during games.
Sweets are perfect for energy replenishment,
and most of all, I like the taste!

name: reXer
text:
I often get them as gifts, but for some reason,
there's a lot of chocolate mint flavor...?
I like it, so I'm happy, though.

name: Hitomi
text:
Chocolate mint is good!
I like that unique scent and taste too!

name: Ryusei
text: Ah, talking about chocolate makes me hungry—!

name: Ganran
text:
Right! Shall we take a break soon?
...Hm, what's this smell?

Ganran stopped and sniffed around.
Then, he twitched his nose.

An impressive spiciness, with sourness and sweetness.
An ethnic aroma, as if stimulating various spices—

name: reXer
text:
It smells really good and appetizing...!
—Wh-Who's there!?

name: Stuntman
text:
...Hehehe.
You've noticed this scent, Choco Hunters!

name: Stuntman
text:
You can't climb a mountain on an empty stomach.
You want to replenish your energy to move your body, don't you?

name: Stuntman
text:
So! We've brought the #1, the most popular dish
from the NeoTalents staff cafeteria,
with chocolate as a secret ingredient.

name: Stuntman
text:
Everyone's favorite, special curry!
What's more, we got the recipe from the chefs of Gourmet Fighters.

name: Stuntman
text:
Well, how is it?
Doesn't this scent make you even hungrier?
There were NeoTalents staff members cooking curry.

Melt-in-your-mouth vegetables,
and soft-looking chunks of meat rolling around—

options.text: This curry looks like something Ryekie-san would love!

name: Hitomi
text:
I can't resist this scent...!
I'm getting hungry too!

name: reXer
text:
Could it be that this
curry is a gift from the show?

name: Ryusei
text:
...No, reXer-kun.
A ChocoFull shoot isn't that sweet!

name: Ryusei
text:
We've been pranked so many times.
I'm sure this time too...!

name: reXer
text: W-What!? So this is a trap...!

name: Stuntman
text:
Hehehe, of course you are ChocoFull's "hunters".
You'll have to hunt for the prey you desire yourselves!

name: Stuntman
text:
However, if you fail the hunt...
you'll have to eat it with plenty of super-spicy seasoning,
a specialty of Garunderra.

After saying that, the host staff snapped his fingers.
In response, the cooking staff stopped the fire and stood up.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
I see, so it's a battle!
That's easy to understand, isn't it!?

name: reXer
text:
Super spicy...
I'm a little interested,
but I can't hold back in any battle!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, [Player]-san!
Please transform us!

Nodding at Hitomi's words,
[Player] operated the device.

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one!
'He who does not work, neither shall he eat!'
I'll do my part as well!

name: reXer
text:
I'll make sure to get proper nutrition
before I run out of stamina from the heat!

name: Ryusei
text:
I'll also get a delicious lunch
with a dazzling battle!

name: Hitomi
text:
It smells really good...!
Let's get started right away!

name: Stuntman
text:
Now, will the hunters' lunch become a volcano-style meal!?
The battle everyone's waiting for begins!
Battle Start

—After the battle,
steaming hot curry was laid out before the heroes.

name: All
text: Let's eat—!

name: Hitomi
text:
...Mmm, it's delicious!
It's a simple curry, but the aroma is so good, it's the best!

name: Ganran
text:
This has a rich flavor, delicious!
The secret ingredient, chocolate, is really effective!

name: Ryusei
text:
Food eaten outdoors always tastes better, doesn't it—!
Maybe it's because the atmosphere is also appetizing—!

name: reXer
text:
It's after a good workout from mountain climbing and battling, after all.
...Hey, can I try a bite of that super-spicy one too?

options.text: It's the color of magma, but...
Oh, I have a feeling this will make a good shot!

name: reXer
text:
I quite like spicy food.
I've never seen anything this color before, though...
Since it's here, I can't resist trying it, right?

name: Ryusei
text:
reXer-kun, you're brave—!
But don't overdo it and get an upset stomach, okay?

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, then me too!
Let's have a spicy endurance contest!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, alright!
Then it's a match, Ganran!
—Let's eat.

name: reXer
text:
—!? So hot—!!
It-it hurts, w-water, water...!!!

name: Ganran
text:
Gwo...oh...!
Is this hot, spicy, or painful...?
My, my senses are fading...!!

Hitomi hurriedly handed water to reXer,
who jumped up, his entire body's fur standing on end.

name: Hitomi
text:
H-here!
reXer-san, are you alright...!?

name: Ryusei
text:
It's a good thing we won that battle earlier...
Just thinking about losing gives me chills.

name: Ryusei
text:
They said that it was a super spicy seasoning originating from Garunderra...
Ganran-san, can you eat this level of spiciness?

name: Ganran
text:
...It's, spicy, but...!
If you get used to it, you can feel the umami...!

name: Hitomi
text:
Sweat is gushing from your whole body!
Ganran-san, please drink some water without pushing yourself...!

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, sorry, Hitomi-chan...!
Gah... I've never eaten anything this spicy even in Garunderra...!

name: reXer
text:
—Hah, phew...
This is too much...
It's still tingling...

options.text: The staff member gave this to me.

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, what's this, [Player]-san?
Do I just read this? ...Um.

name: Ryusei
text:
"The special curry from NeoTalents Production
& Gourmet Fighters that the hunters just ate!"

name: Ryusei
text:
"If you want to try it for yourself,
the regular and volcano versions are both available
for order from the limited website!", it says!

name: Ryusei
text:
I tried it too,
and it's really delicious with a rich flavor,
so I highly recommend it—!

name: Hitomi
text:
The secret ingredient, chocolate, seems to be the key to its deliciousness!
Everyone watching, please check it out!

name: reXer
text:
C-Challengers who want to try the super-spicy version,
please prepare plenty of water before you attempt it...!
It's important to prepare your equipment before battle...!

options.text: That was a commercial from the show—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, so there's a commercial too!
They're thorough, aren't they.

Saying that, Ryusei tried to put away the cue card he was handed.
However, reXer saw something and called out to him.

name: reXer
text:
...Hm? Ryusei, that paper.
Is there some writing on the back...?
No, isn't there a picture drawn on it?

name: Ryusei
text:
The back...?
Ah, you're right, what's this?

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, what's this picture?
It looks familiar...
Oh, it's a map of Choco Volcano, isn't it?

name: Hitomi
text:
Indeed, it looks exactly like the volcano seen from afar.
So, this red X-mark...

name: Ryusei
text:
Could it be a treasure map?
Maybe rock cacao is buried there!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Your agency probably did their homework thoroughly!

name: Ganran
text:
I don't know the exact location of the vein,
but with a map, I can find the spot!

options.text: Then, let's head there right away!

name: reXer
text:
If it's something the NeoTalents staff gave us,
it might be a trap again...

name: reXer
text:
But, we can't not go, right!
Our stomachs are full, so Ganran, can you guide us?

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, leave it to me!
I have to do my job as a guide properly too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Exercise after a meal!
My hamstrings are perfectly ready too!

name: Hitomi
text:
After eating a lot, it's time to burn some calories!
I hope we get the rock cacao!

name: Ganran
text:
The location on this map might have rough terrain.
Everyone, please be careful and follow me!

At Ganran's words,
the group nodded and proceeded forward.

At the very end of the line, [Player],
who was operating the drone, suddenly looked up.

[Player] focused their attention again,
sensing their surroundings.

However, looking around,
they felt no abnormality.

name: reXer
text:
—Hey, [Player]!
Let's move forward with the camera, please!

[Player] paid attention to their surroundings again,
but there was no change from before.

Confirming there was no presence,
they trotted towards reXer's call.
